resources.string: 1. ABOVE SAID INFORMATION IS CORRECT IN ALL RESPECT AND WE UNDERTAKE TO INFORM YOU IF ANY CHANGE IN THE ABOVE PARTICULAR REGARDING OUR BUSINESS FROM TIME TO TIME.
2. AS PER OUR TERM SIGNATURE CHEQUE IN FAVOUR OF VASTRAM RESORCES WITHOUT MENTION DATE.

3. IF THE INPUT TAX CREDIT OF GST IS NOT REALIZED/RECEIVE IN VASTRAM RESORCES GST LEDGER, DUE TO CUSTOMERS FAULT, THAN CUSTOMER SHALL BE LIABLE TO PAY SUCH TAX AMOUNT WITH INTEREST AS WELL AS PENALTY TO VASTRAM RESORCES.
4. IF PAYMENT RECEIVE AFTER DUE DATE INTEREST WILL BE CHARGED 15% PER ANNUM.
5.WE HAVE NO LIABILITY FOR SHORTAGE OF GOODS IN TRANSPORT. IF VENDOR ACCEPT THAT SHORTAGE IN PACKING TIME THEN YOUR ACCOUNT IS CREDIT FOR CLAIM.
6. PLEASE PREFER YOUR TRANSPORT FOR YOUR CHOICE.
7. CONTACT IMMEDIATELY IF YOU HAVE ANY COMPLAIN OR SUGGESTION IN OUR SERVICES.
ONLINE AND OFFLINE MARKETPLACE FOR GARMENTS MANUFACTURER AND RETAILER
Choose your option from give below option to do a specific task
